gen:link.label:label: BV1775: The item "Consolidated Group SCR" reported in S.25.01.04.02 Calculation of Solvency Capital Requirement should be equal to the sum of "Solvency Capital Requirement calculated on the basis of Art. 336 (a) of Delegated Regulation (EU) 2015/35, excluding capital add-on", "Capital add-ons already set", "Capital requirement for other financial sectors (Non-insurance capital requirements)", "Capital requirement for non-controlled participations", "Capital requirement for residual undertakings" and "Capital requirement for collective investment undertakings or investments packaged as funds".
